title: "Blue's Clues" Host Steve Burns Explains "Abrupt" Exit From Show | E! News
author: E! News
description:
Almost two decades since leaving the show, the original host of "Blue's Clues" Steve Burns addresses his "abrupt" departure. Hear Steve's heartwarming message!

Full Story: https://www.eonline.com/news/1301544/blues-clues-fans-this-message-from-host-steve-burns-will-have-you-feeling-nostalgic
